CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque;Ksenija Turković
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant applied to ORG ( PERSON ) for enforcement of a final judgement by which ORG , the applicant ’s former husband , was ordered to pay her alimony .

CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court issued a writ of execution ordering GPE to pay the applicant amounts of CARDINAL NORP kunas ( HRK ) together with the statutory default interest for the period starting from DATE until the payment , and also the amount of HRK CARDINAL together with the statutory default interest starting from DATE until the payment on account of costs and expenses .
CARDINAL . The writ of execution was served on ORG of ORG ( Hrvatski zavod za mirovinsko osiguranje , Područna služba ORG ) for enforcement .
CARDINAL . On DATE GPE appealed against the writ of execution and on DATE the applicant responded to his appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court held a hearing at which both parties gave their statements .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court instructed GPE to institute separate civil proceedings with a view to declaring the enforcement inadmissible .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant appealed against the decision of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the case - file was forwarded to ORG ( Županijski sud u Vukovaru ) to decide upon the parties’ appeals .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal and returned the case - file to the first - instance court .
CARDINAL . NORP However , since ORG failed to decide upon the appeal lodged by GPE , the case file was again returned to it and on DATE it dismissed GPE ’s appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court informed ORG of ORG , that the writ of execution became final and that it should be executed .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court again asked ORG of ORG to execute the final writ of execution .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG transferred HRK CARDINAL,CARDINAL to the applicant ’s account ; on DATE it transferred the amount of HRK CARDINAL ; and on CARDINAL DATE the amount of HRK CARDINAL.CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , on DATE and DATE the applicant lodged a request for the protection of the right to a hearing within a reasonable time ( zahtjev za zaštitu prava na suđenje u razumnom roku ) with ORG ( PERSON ) complaining about the length of the above enforcement proceedings . In these proceedings the ORG was represented by ORG ( ORG odvjetništvo PERSON ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG examined the case file of ORG and a submission of ORG , and found that the enforcement proceedings had started on DATE and that they were still pending . It considered that the proceedings had not been excessively long and dismissed the applicant ’s request .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s appeal was dismissed by a CARDINAL - judge panel of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s subsequent constitutional complaint was declared inadmissible by ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) .
